Title: Troops repel terrorist attack on Maiduguri–Damboa Road
Summary: Troops of the Joint Task Force North East, Operation HADIN KAI (OPHK) repelled a coordinated terrorist attack on Maiduguri–Damboa Main Supply Route (MSR) in Borno .

Title: NBA calls for probe into alleged discrepancies in tax reform law
Summary: NBA calls for probe into alleged discrepancies in tax reform law . There have been reports that the versions of the tax laws released to the public differ from those released . The Nigerian Bar Association has called for an investigation into the controversies .

Title: Christmas: FRSC deploys 452 personnel, 12 patrol vehicles in Bauchi
Summary: Federal Road Safety Corps deploys 452 personnel, 12 patrol vehicles in Bauchi . FRSC deployed to ensure the free flow of traffic during the 2025 Christmas celebration .

Title: Christian leaders commend Uba Sani at Kaduna Christmas carol
Summary: Christian clerics from different church denominations commended Governor Uba Sani’s leadership style for fairness, equity, and for carrying all sections of the state along with the administration . The church leaders made this known during the Christmas carol organised by the governor .

Title: Delta police roll out massive security for Yuletide
Summary: The Delta State Police Command has announced an extensive statewide security operation ahead of the Christmas and New Year celebrations, promising residents a hitch-free festive period . In a statement issued on Tuesday by the command’s spokesperson, Bright Edafe, the Commissioner of the State Police .

Title: Yuletide: NCAA storms operations of 3 airlines over passenger welfare, flight disruptions
Summary: Officials of the regulator on Monday stormed the Abuja operations of Xejet, Rano Air and United Nigeria Airline . NCAA describes as a signal that airlines must comply with consumer protection regulations .

Title: At least 8,000 new Epstein-linked documents released by US Justice Dept
Summary: At least 8,000 new documents related to the case of convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein were released on Tuesday on the US Department of Justice's site (DOJ)

Title: Liverpool’s Isak faces two months out after ‘reckless’ tackle – Slot
Summary: Liverpool's Isak faces two months out after ‘reckless’ tackle – Slot . "It's going to be a long injury, for a couple of months," Slot told reporters on Tuesday . "So, yeah, that's a big, big disappointment for him," Slot said .

Title: Tax reforms: No plan to freeze or debit bank accounts in 2026, Oyedele clarifies
Summary: "Misinformation makes you panic and fear a reform that is designed to help you," Oyedele says . "When they tell you that your account will be frozen or automatically debited, ask them for the evidence in the new law," he says .

Title: Hardship: Stop blaming govs alone, FG gets 52% of federation revenue — Radda
Summary: The revenue-sharing formula leaves subnational governments struggling to meet growing demands, says Radda . He said widespread assumptions that governors control the bulk of national resources .
